org.araneaframework.http.filter
Class StandardClientStateFilterWidget

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.BaseComponent
      org.araneaframework.core.BaseService
          org.araneaframework.core.BaseWidget
              org.araneaframework.framework.core.BaseFilterWidget
                  org.araneaframework.http.filter.StandardClientStateFilterWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, FilterWidget, Serializable, Service, Widget
Deprecated. it is outdated and does not work correctly because some state may be actually modified by Widget.Interface.render(OutputData) call. Aranea 1.2 will provide more general StandardStateVersioningFilterWidget which can provide similar functionality.

public class StandardClientStateFilterWidget
extends BaseFilterWidget
implements FilterWidget

A filter providing saving the state on the client side. On every render the descendent of the filter is serialized and written out to the client.

Author:
"Toomas RÃ¶mer" , "Jevgeni Kabanov"
